title: Summoners' Esports Team Application

embed.description: We apologise for the last attempt at running the team, unfortunately due to some complications we had to start over. On the 4/5th February we will be running a two day event. The best of the players that apply will be put into teams and will play a short circuit.

body:
Hello everyone!
We are looking for players to be in our Summoners' eSports Team!!
On the 4/5th February we will be running a two day event. The best of the players that apply will be put into teams and will play a short circuit. Each of the players will be rated individually on skill, teamwork and communication.
https://goo.gl/forms/YGIg5s5EsCjRSbel1
